languages.text: The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.
languages.original_text: Персонаж отмечает врагов в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}зоне действия{/g} и немедленно завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. До начала своего следующего хода он получает +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g} против первой атаки каждого из отмеченных врагов. Заблокировав такую атаку, персонаж атакует соответствующего врага в ответ.

traits.locale_text: Wielder selects multiple enemies and immediately ends their turn. Until the next turn, wielder gains +15% chance to block against the next attack performed by those enemies and if that attack is blocked — the wielder will attack back.

The wielder marks enemies within the area of effect. The Wielder's turn immediately ends. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% block against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% block against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% block against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

languages.text: Wielder selects multiple enemies and immediately ends their turn. Until the next turn, wielder gains +15% chance to block against the next attack performed by those enemies and if that attack is blocked — the wielder will attack back.

traits.locale_text: Wielder selects multiple enemies and immediately ends their turn. Until the next turn, wielder gains +15% chance to block against the next attack performed by those enemies and if that attack is blocked — the wielder will attack back.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanı{/g} içindeki düşmanları işaretler ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} anında sonlandırır. Kullanan kişi, bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek işaretli düşmanların her birinin yapacağı ilk saldırıya karşı +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} kazanır. Kullanan kişi, böyle bir saldırıyı bloklarsa ilgili düşmana karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text: The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, etki alanı içindeki düşmanları işaretler ve turunu anında sonlandırır. Kullanan kişi, bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek işaretli düşmanların her birinin yapacağı ilk saldırıya karşı +%15 bloklama kazanır. Kullanan kişi, böyle bir saldırıyı bloklarsa ilgili düşmana karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir.

Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanı{/g} içindeki düşmanları işaretler ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} anında sonlandırır. Kullanan kişi, bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek işaretli düşmanların her birinin yapacağı ilk saldırıya karşı +%15 bloklama kazanır. Kullanan kişi, böyle bir saldırıyı bloklarsa ilgili düşmana karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir.

languages.text: El portador marca a los enemigos situados en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} y concluye su turno inmediatamente. Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador gana un +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g} contra el primer ataque efectuado por cada uno de los enemigos marcados. Si logra bloquear estos ataques, el portador contraataca al enemigo correspondiente.
languages.original_text: The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

traits.locale_text: El portador marca a los enemigos situados en el área de efecto y concluye su turno inmediatamente. Hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno, el portador gana un +15 % de bloqueo contra el primer ataque efectuado por cada uno de los enemigos marcados. Si logra bloquear estos ataques, el portador contraataca al enemigo correspondiente.

El portador marca a los enemigos situados en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} y concluye su turno inmediatamente. Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador gana un +15 % de bloqueo contra el primer ataque efectuado por cada uno de los enemigos marcados. Si logra bloquear estos ataques, el portador contraataca al enemigo correspondiente.

languages.text: 装备者标记{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}效果范围{/g}内的所有敌人，同时立刻结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。装备者的下个回合开始之前，当被标记的敌人首次攻击装备者时，针对此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}率提高15%。如果装备者通过这种方式格挡了攻击，则会立刻进行反击。
languages.original_text: The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

traits.locale_text: 装备者标记效果范围内的所有敌人，同时立刻结束回合。装备者的下个回合开始之前，当被标记的敌人首次攻击装备者时，针对此次攻击的格挡率提高15%。如果装备者通过这种方式格挡了攻击，则会立刻进行反击。
装备者标记{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}效果范围{/g}内的所有敌人，同时立刻结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。装备者的下个回合开始之前，当被标记的敌人首次攻击装备者时，针对此次攻击的格挡率提高15%。如果装备者通过这种方式格挡了攻击，则会立刻进行反击。

languages.text: L'utilisateur marque les ennemis dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} et met immédiatement fin à son tour. Jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +15 % au {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocage{/g} contre la première attaque effectuée par chaque ennemi marqué. En cas de blocage réussi, l'utilisateur contre-attaque l'assaillant.
languages.original_text: The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur marque les ennemis dans la zone d'effet et met immédiatement fin à son tour. Jusqu'à son prochain tour, il gagne +15 % au blocage contre la première attaque effectuée par chaque ennemi marqué. En cas de blocage réussi, l'utilisateur contre-attaque l'assaillant.

L'utilisateur marque les ennemis dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} et met immédiatement fin à son tour. Jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +15 % au blocage contre la première attaque effectuée par chaque ennemi marqué. En cas de blocage réussi, l'utilisateur contre-attaque l'assaillant.

L'utilisateur marque les ennemis dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} et met immédiatement fin à son tour. En cas de blocage réussi, l'utilisateur contre-attaque l'assaillant.

languages.text: 使用者は、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内の敵をマークし、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了する。次の自身のターンまで、使用者はマークした各敵の最初の攻撃に対して+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}を獲得する。該当する攻撃がブロックされると、使用者は対応する敵に反撃する。
languages.original_text: The wielder marks enemies within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} and immediately ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the start of their next turn, the wielder gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} against the first attack made by each of the marked enemies. If such an attack is blocked, the wielder counter-attacks the corresponding enemy.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は、効果範囲内の敵をマークし、即座にターンを終了する。次の自身のターンまで、使用者はマークした各敵の最初の攻撃に対して+15%のブロックを獲得する。該当する攻撃がブロックされると、使用者は対応する敵に反撃する。
使用者は、効果範囲内の敵をマークし、即座にターンを終了する。次の自身のターンまで、使用者はマークした各敵の最初の攻撃に対して+15%のブロックを獲得する。該当する攻撃がブロックされると、使用者は対応する敵に反撃する。

languages.text: Der Träger markiert Gegner im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} und beendet den Zug augenblicklich. Bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Träger +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g} gegen den ersten Angriff jedes markierten Gegners. Wird ein derartiger Angriff geblockt, geht der Träger zum Gegenangriff auf den jeweiligen Gegner über.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж отмечает врагов в зоне действия и немедленно завершает ход. До начала своего следующего хода он получает +15% к блоку против первой атаки каждого из отмеченных врагов. Заблокировав такую атаку, персонаж атакует соответствующего врага в ответ.

Персонаж отмечает врагов в зоне действия и немедленно завершает ход. До начала своего следующего хода он получает +15% к блоку против первой атаки каждого из отмеченных врагов. Заблокировав такую атаку, персонаж атакует соответствующего врага в ответ.
